text:
The ten-day Uthrayana Punyakala festival began with the hoisting of the flag at Sri Arunachaleswarar Temple, Tiruvannamalai on Wednesday.

Priests hoisted the holy flag.

Idols of several deities were present near the flag mast during the festival. The decorated idols would be taken on procession around the mada streets during the festival days.

On January 15, the final day of the festival, Uthsavamurthi would be taken to Thamaraikulam for Theerthavari. – Staff Reporter
title: Uthrayana Punyakala festival begins
